long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is to validate a bid response from DSPs (demand source) against to MoPub exchange. MoPub exchange is a platform where it enables DSPs to bid on ad inventories from publishers.

The bid response validator allows anyone to test and validate their bid response. It generates ad request to MoPub platform to run the auction and a bidder will participate the auction via extension. If there is anything wrong with the bid, it will gives you a detail error message for you to fix.

This is for MoPub internal users only.
